newsitem.title: USA: IPO FILING -- EarthLink Network Inc.
newsitem.headline: IPO FILING -- EarthLink Network Inc.

text.p: Total shares to be offered N/A
Shrs offered by shareholders N/A Shrs outstanding after ipo N/A

Business: The Pasadena, Calif., company is an internet service provider that was formed to help users derive meaningful benefits for the extensive resources for the internet. Use of Proceeds: The company hopes to raise $34.5 million and use the net proceeds to finance sales and marketing activities, leasehold improvements and investments on network equipment, new service introduction and for working capital and other general corporate purposes.
